articles.author: John Thornhill
articles.title: Can technology's 'zoomers' outrun the 'doomers'? - Financial Times
articles.description: There may be a case for optimism in AI’s transformation of scientific discovery but it’s too early to be sure
articles.content:
A few years ago, the Oxford physicist David Deutsch came up with a simple and beguiling theory, which he called the principle of optimism.
In his view, all knowledge that does not contradict the rul… [+4373 chars]
